TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MediaElement extends System.Windows.FrameworkElement implements class System.Windows.Markup.IUriContext
Public Class MediaElement Inherits FrameworkElement Implements IUriContext
public ref class MediaElement : System::Windows::FrameworkElement, System::Windows::Markup::IUriContext
type MediaElement = class inherit FrameworkElement interface IUriContext
.class public auto ansi MediaElement extends System.Windows.FrameworkElement implements class System.Windows.Markup.IUriContext

summary.span: 表示包含音频和/或视频的控件。

span.span: Represents a control that contains audio and/or video.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用应用程序分发媒体时，不可将媒体文件用作项目资源。When distributing media with your application, you cannot use a media file as a project resource. 在项目文件中，必须将媒体类型设置为 `Content`，并将 `CopyToOutputDirectory` 设置为 `PreserveNewest` 或 `Always`。In your project file, you must instead set the media type to `Content` and set `CopyToOutputDirectory` to `PreserveNewest` or `Always`. 可用于两种不同的模式，具体取决于驱动控件的方式：独立模式或时钟模式。 can be used in two different modes, depending on what is driving the control: independent mode or clock mode. 在独立模式下使用时， 类似于图像，可以直接指定 URI。When used in the independent mode, the is analogous to an image, and URI can be directly specified. 在时钟模式下，可以将 视为动画的目标，因此它将在计时树中具有相应的 和 条目。In clock mode, the can be thought of as a target for an animation, and thus it will have corresponding and entries in the timing tree. 有关媒体模式的详细信息，请参阅[多媒体概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/multimedia-overview)。For more information on media modes, see the [Multimedia Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/multimedia-overview). 有关在独立模式下控制 的示例，请参阅[如何：控制 MediaElement （播放、暂停、停止、音量和速度）](/dotnet/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-control-a-mediaelement-play-pause-stop-volume-and-speed)。For an example of controlling a in independent mode, see [How to: Control a MediaElement (Play, Pause, Stop, Volume, and Speed)](/dotnet/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-control-a-mediaelement-play-pause-stop-volume-and-speed). 在引发 事件之前，控件的 和 将报告为零，因为媒体内容用于确定控件的最终大小和位置。Until the event has been raised, the and of the control will report as zero as the media content is used to determine the final size and location of the control. 对于仅限音频的内容，这些属性将始终为零。For audio only content, these properties will always be zero. 对于固定大小的控件，可以设置 和/或 属性。For a fixed size control, the and/or properties can be set. 但是，若要保留媒体的纵横比，请设置 或 属性，但不能同时设置两者。However, to preserve the media's aspect ratio, set the or properties but not both.

The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值-1 表示左侧扬声器的100%，1表示右侧扬声器的100%。A value of -1 represents 100% of the left side speakers and 1 represents 100% of the right side speakers. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果设置此属性，则会将媒体元素置于其使用计时引擎的模式中。Setting this property puts the media element into a mode in which it utilizes the timing engine. 先前播放的任何媒体都将停止，并打开与新时钟关联的统一资源标识符（URI）。Any media that was previously playing is stopped and the uniform resource identifier (URI) associated with the new clock is opened.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Pause() cil managed

summary.span: 在当前位置暂停媒体。

span.span: Pauses media at the current position.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果媒体当前正在运行，则此方法将暂停媒体。This method pauses the media if the media is currently running. 方法可用于恢复。The method can be used to resume. 仅当 `null` 属性时，才能使用此方法。This method can be used only when the property is `null`. 如果 属性不`null`，则计时引擎会控制媒体播放行为。When the property is non-`null`, the timing engine controls media playback behavior. 仅当 属性设置为 时，此方法才有效。This method has an effect only if the property is set to .

span.span: The property is not .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Play() cil managed

summary.span: 从当前位置播放媒体。

span.span: Plays media from the current position.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果媒体当前不处于活动状态，则此方法将启动媒体，或在暂停媒体时恢复媒体。This method will begin the media if it is not currently active or resume media if it is paused. 如果媒体当前正在运行，则此方法不起作用。This method has no effect if the media is currently running. 仅当 `null` 属性时，才能使用此方法。This method can be used only when the property is `null`. 如果 属性不`null`，则计时引擎会控制媒体播放行为。When the property is non-`null`, the timing engine controls media playback behavior. 仅当 属性设置为 时，此方法才有效。This method has an effect only if the property is set to .

span.span: The property is not .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan Position { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };
member this.Position : TimeSpan with get, set

summary.span: 通过媒体的播放时间获取或设置进度的当前位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the current position of progress through the media's playback time.

value.span: 自媒体开始以来的时间量。

span.span: The amount of time since the beginning of the media.
The default is 00:00:00.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过设置此属性，可跳转到播放中的不同点（也称为查找）。Setting this property can enable you to jump to different points in playback (also known as seeking). 并非所有媒体类型都允许查找操作。Not all media types allow seek operations. 如果媒体源不允许查找，则会激发 事件。The event will fire if the media source does not allow seeking. 此属性在 事件发生后才会生效。This property has no effect until after the event has occurred. 仅当 `null` 属性时，才能设置此属性。This property can be set only when the property is `null`. 如果 属性不`null`，则计时引擎会控制媒体播放行为。When the property is non-`null`, the timing engine controls media playback behavior.

span.span: The property is not .

member this.ScrubbingEnabled : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 是否将在暂停状态下为查找操作更新帧。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the will update frames for seek operations while paused.

value.span: 如果在暂停状态下更新帧，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if frames are updated while paused; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果设置为 "`false`"，则当媒体正在播放时，查找特定位置将仅更新显示的帧。When set to `false`, seeking to a specific location will only update the displayed frame if media is playing. 将 设置为 `true` 会导致性能降低，尤其是在以交互方式控制媒体播放时。Setting to `true` can incur some performance costs, especially when interactively controlling media playback. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置此属性的值会导致媒体播放。Setting the value of this property causes the media to play. 仅当 `null` 属性时，才能设置此属性。This property can be set only when the property is `null`. 如果 属性不`null`，则计时引擎会控制媒体播放行为。When the property is non-`null`, the timing engine controls media playback behavior. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|、, |

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double SpeedRatio { double get(); void set(double value); };
member this.SpeedRatio : double with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置媒体的速率。

span.span: Gets or sets the speed ratio of the media.
The speed ratio of the media.

value.span: 有效范围介于 0（零）和无穷大之间。

span.span: The valid range is between 0 (zero) and infinity.

value.span: 小于 1 的值产生比正常播放慢的速率，而大于 1 的值产生比正常播放快的速率。

span.span: Values less than 1 yield slower than normal playback, and values greater than 1 yield faster than normal playback.
Negative values are treated as 0.
The default value is 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当 `null` 属性时，才能设置此属性。This property can be set only when the property is `null`. 如果 属性不`null`，则计时引擎会控制媒体播放行为。When the property is non-`null`, the timing engine controls media playback behavior. 如果 的值为1，则可能不会播放音频。Audio playback may not occur unless the value of is 1.

span.span: The property is not .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Stop() cil managed

summary.span: 停止并重置媒体使其从头播放。

span.span: Stops and resets media to be played from the beginning.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当 `null` 属性时，才能使用此方法。This method can be used only when the property is `null`. 如果 属性不`null`，则计时引擎会控制媒体播放行为。When the property is non-`null`, the timing engine controls media playback behavior. 仅当 属性设置为 时，此方法才有效。This method has an effect only if the property is set to .

span.span: The property is not .

member this.Stretch : System.Windows.Media.Stretch with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个 值，该值描述 如何填充目标矩形。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that describes how a fills the destination rectangle.

value.span: 所呈现的媒体的拉伸值。

span.span: The stretch value for the rendered media.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下图演示了不同 值。The following illustration demonstrates the different values. ![不同的 TileBrush 拉伸设置](~/add/media/img-mmgraphics-stretchenum.jpg "不同的 TileBrush 拉伸设置")![Different TileBrush Stretch settings](~/add/media/img-mmgraphics-stretchenum.jpg "Different TileBrush Stretch settings") 不同的渐变传播方法Different gradient spread methods ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建 并设置内容的 模式。The following example shows how to create a and set the mode of content.
